notes.text:
This update for apache2-mod_wsgi fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-2255: Hardened the trusted proxy header filter to avoid bypass. (bsc#1201634)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in mod_wsgi. The X-Client-IP header is not removed from a request from an untrusted proxy, allowing an attacker to pass the X-Client-IP header to the target WSGI application because the condition to remove it is missing.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
